name: VR Visit Horror Areas 3d
description:
The All-time Best vr visit horror areas Game for adventures and horror lovers.
The night is dark, house, graveyard and jungle area is alone empty. All it calls for you is to come, but not go. Ever!! Never ending trapping. The vr visit horror areas an immersive 360° horror virtual reality experience which is compatible with all your apple and VR devices. Among the many VR Games and Apps, The vr visit horror areas is a game that gives users the real time horror scary feel. What you’ll need to have this experience is a mobile phone with a Gyroscope and a VR Headset. The vr visit horror areas is a stairway to the  spookiest experiences on every step and turn. The horror doesn’t end. And for us horror doesn’t mean dangling. Spider webs and creepy creatures prowling towards you but things that are meant to be scary- the place, the people. Get ready to jolt yourselves into terrifying scants of a horror house,

How to play: - You should have gyro sensor in your apple device. - Slide your device into VR Glasses. - Align your device into center of glasses. - Use revolving chair or stand in open place. - Look between your feet to walk/stop. - You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis. Features: - Virtual Reality based 3d Fantasy environment. - 360 degree rotation. - Compatible with virtual reality glasses. - Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals.
